# Aws Cost And Usage Report

```text
aws-20200911/Service/CostManagement/AwsCostAndUsageReport
```

```text
include('aws-20200911/Service/CostManagement/AwsCostAndUsageReport')
```

|icon|card|element|group|
|---|---|---|---|
|![](AwsCostAndUsageReport.png)|![](AwsCostAndUsageReport.card.png)|![](AwsCostAndUsageReport.element.png)|![](AwsCostAndUsageReport.group.png)|



## card
### Load remotely
```plantuml
@startuml
' configures the library
!global $LIB_BASE_LOCATION="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tmorin/plantuml-libs/master/dist"
' loads the library
!include $LIB_BASE_LOCATION/bootstrap.puml
' loads the aws-20200911 bootstrap
include('aws-20200911/bootstrap')
' loads the AwsCostAndUsageReport element
include('aws-20200911/Service/CostManagement/AwsCostAndUsageReport')
AwsCostAndUsageReportCard('aws_cost_and_usage_report', 'Aws Cost And Usage Report', 'Molestiae praesentium aut natus dolorem. Aut consequatur fugiat a consequatur ut.')
@enduml
```
### Load locally
```plantuml
@startuml
' configures the library
!global $INCLUSION_MODE="local"
!global $LIB_BASE_LOCATION="../../.."
' loads the library
!include $LIB_BASE_LOCATION/bootstrap.puml
' loads the aws-20200911 bootstrap
include('aws-20200911/bootstrap')
' loads the AwsCostAndUsageReport element
include('aws-20200911/Service/CostManagement/AwsCostAndUsageReport')
AwsCostAndUsageReportCard('aws_cost_and_usage_report', 'Aws Cost And Usage Report', 'Molestiae praesentium aut natus dolorem. Aut consequatur fugiat a consequatur ut.')
@enduml
```

end note
}
@enduml
